website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and easily compatible UHD 4K projector with a reasonable price tag.
pros: Produces sharp, crystal clear picture with faithful colours and high contrast
Features general sports mode and soccer-specific settings
Works with consoles, players, and streaming sticks
cons: Better suited for sports fans than film and TV enthusiasts

customer_reviews.title: Unstable product. Needs rigouros testing from BENQ
customer_reviews.text: I got this from amazon warehouse deals and loved the projector. It was exactly as the online reviews stated. But a few days of use and the projector started to only show everything in black and white. I guess I got a dud piece but it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: TimKoh

customer_reviews.title: Better check the Firmware!!
customer_reviews.text: After much research before buying a mid-range projector this model seemed the best. My main criteria was ability to watch UHD but after failing to install Sky UHD channels we called the BENQ helpline to discover the one that was delivered had out of date Firmware installed that did not allow UHD! BENQ have (so far) been great and organised collection and an engineer to reinstall the correct firmware and we are hoping to get it back and working properly within 2 weeks. Irritating that we are without it for another few weeks but from what we saw before return picture is very good already so looking forward to what it will be like when functioning as it should
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Received faulty item
customer_reviews.text: The projector does not project. No light coming out after power on. Sent it back to Projection Center to Poland. They refunded the initial amount, but not the return postage. So amazon had to step in. My review was removed from Projection Center and now they're back to all five stars :) I wonder if I should purchase it from a physical store instead..
customer_reviews.author: moujik

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this projector. The picture quality was very good and you can watch it in the unless the programme or movie doesn’t have a lot of dark scenes. This is easily fixed though with light blinds. Other reviews say that the fan is loud but I would disagree
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: NON UK Power cord and remote that dies
customer_reviews.text: The remote stops working after a few minutes and the power supply has a 2 prong plug not a 3pin so additional cost is involved. unable to test further set it back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.  Delivers a punchy picture.  Just love it
customer_reviews.text: Only grip is that there is not much zoom so use the maths app to work out the throw and size of picture on the wall. Fortunately mine worked out just great
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Not the right one for us
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item but only because it didn't fit in our room like the previous one we had. Short throw was not short enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a nice projector with a decent picture quality, I have read a lot of reviews and some saying about the color accuracy.. honestly, you you are like me, not an expert... you will be amazed with the picture! I have tested during the day with some good light and even my wife (she is never impressed ) said WOW! I can’t wait to play some games!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Furtado

customer_reviews.title: HDR works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Given four out of five stars for picture quality, only because the left hand side of the screen is ever so slightly blurred. However this is not noticeable when playing games or watching a movie
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4k projector with 3d support
customer_reviews.text: Better than i expected! Very bright and sharp image, only sort of downside is that the unit does give out some heat and the light hum of the fans other than that its an excellent 4k projector.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas D'souza

customer_reviews.title: So good that I got a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. It cannot do 60hz at 4k only 30hz. I got a refund and bought the optoma. Avoid this.
